mapper.insert: insert into filter_scheme (scheme_id, user_id, scheme_detail, multiple, start_issue_no, lottery_type, continuous_count, invest_money, award_stop, award_status, award_detail, award_money, update_time) values (#{schemeId}, #{userId}, #{schemeDetail}, #{multiple}, #{startIssueNo}, #{lotteryType}, #{continuousCount}, #{investMoney}, #{awardStop}, #{awardStatus}, #{awardDetail}, #{awardMoney},#{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update filter_scheme
id = #{id},
scheme_id = #{schemeId},
user_id = #{userId},
scheme_detail = #{schemeDetail},
multiple = #{multiple},
start_issue_no = #{startIssueNo},
lottery_type = #{lotteryType},
continuous_count = #{continuousCount},
invest_money = #{investMoney},
award_stop = #{awardStop},
award_status = #{awardStatus},
award_detail = #{awardDetail},
award_money = #{awardMoney},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where scheme_id = #{schemeId};
